title: The Princess Mermaid and the Missing Sea Shells
description: Princess Nicole and all the other mermaids learn an important lesson about why to never go swimming alone. Read along to find out what happens when Captain J. Lee Fish captures Princess Nicole swimming alone, and how the mermaids get her back. Discover how they sent Captain J. Lee Fish and his crew swimming off to the far corners of the seven seas.
author: Michael J. DiPinto
